arts.ttl: Aston Villa v Fulham: predicted line-up, team news and match preview
arts.sum: It feels as if every match is a milestone for Aston Villa at the moment, so bad has been their form at the start of the season. Villa are baby-stepping in the right direction. They’ve conceded two goals in four matches since the international break. Defeats became draws. Draws became a win.
